overview: Seductive Beauty - Kate impatiently waits for Damon to finish his phone call. He finally returns, finding her partially undressed, seductively calling for his touch. Happy to comply, he caresses her soft skin, taking a sensual tour of her delightful curves. It's clear that they have other plans for Chad, and after the first kiss he is inclined to see things from their point of view.  Perfect Couple - On a mission to get some from her sl--ping husband, Mia crawls into bed, dressed only in lingerie. She lets Danny know she's in charge by pressing him back to the bed and directing his hands where she wants to be touched.  Kamasutra - Sydney is exploring the Kamasutra and warming herself up with lusty touches beneath her bra. When Damon arrives, Sydney wastes no time going into full-on seduction mode as she aims to put to use all of her new sexual knowledge.
title: Seductive Beauty
